descriptions: Optimized business logic and improved performance for large-scale operations by using advanced C++ algorithms and efficient programming practices.

descriptions: Designed a scalable full stack job board platform with modular architecture, secure role-based access, optimized data flow, and responsive user interface to enhance performance, developer experience, and user engagement.
